is that I put me in the middle of it if
you don't know yet some phrasal verbs in
English can be separated some of them
cannot be separated this is a separable
phrasal verb which means you can put the
subjects in the middle of the phrasal
verb or at the end of the phrasal verb
now the one rule here is that if you put
it in the middle you can put a pronoun
you can put me you can put him you can
put her however you cannot put me in
